ðŸ“– Summary: PGlite is a lightweight WASM build of Postgres, offering a TypeScript client library for running Postgres in various environments. It supports both in-memory and persistent databases, utilizing IndexedDB for browsers and the file system for Node.js, Bun, and Deno. Its small size and compatibility with numerous extensions make it suitable for building reactive and local-first applications.
